title: Independent MPs submit proposal for new constitutional amendment
body_lines: A proposal for the 21st amendment to the Constitution has been handed over to Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena on behalf of the 40 Members of Parliament who recently became independent in the House.
The proposal was put forward by MP Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe as a private member’s bill.
It seeks the repealing of the 20th Amendment to the Constitution and reintroduction of the 19th constitutional amendment.
